  • Test color combinations for accessibility
  • The big filled round indicator marks the highest AAA-compatibility for regular text, while the hollow round indicator marks AA-compatibility for regular text. The lowest compatibility for only UI and other graphical elements is marked by a small hollow square
  • Colors can be reordered by dragging
  • Random color generation
  • Hint: organizing the colors in darkest-to-light or lighest-to-dark creates more appealing visuals
  • Need a fresh set of colors? First clear the existing colors, then generate new ones
  • Color modes: Analogous / Complementary / Monochromatic / Triad / Tetrad

Symbol meanings

  • Highest AAA-compliance with regular text
  • Minimum AA-compliance with regular text or AAA-compliance with large text
  • AA-compatibility with graphical elements and large text
Light Mode:
